function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of COVID-19 from local communities to endangered great ape populations","Impact":"Potential for spread of COVID-19 to endangered great ape populations, leading to infection and potential decline in population","Mitigation":"Education and awareness campaigns, implementation of strict biosecurity measures, restriction of human access to great ape habitats","Technologies":"Biosecurity technologies, remote monitoring and surveillance systems","People":"Endangered great ape populations, local communities","Owner":"Conservation organizations, local authorities"},{"Description":"Declines in food security, trade, and tourism leading to reduction in incentives to conserve local biodiversity","Impact":"Reduction in incentives to conserve local biodiversity, potentially leading to increased exploitation and threats to biodiversity","Mitigation":"Investment in alternative livelihood opportunities, financial assistance for local communities, sustainable land-management practices","Technologies":"Community development strategies, sustainable agriculture technologies","People":"Local communities, conservation organizations","Owner":"Government, conservation organizations"},{"Description":"Boosting of tourism revenues leading to negative impacts on biodiversity conservation and wider sustainability goals","Impact":"Negative impacts on biodiversity conservation and wider sustainability goals due to increased tourism activities","Mitigation":"Sustainable tourism practices, conservation-oriented tourism initiatives, responsible visitor management","Technologies":"Tourism impact assessment tools, sustainable tourism certifications","People":"Local communities, tourists","Owner":"Tourism authorities, local authorities"}]}
